name: CountingSheep
0:
”Alexa start counting sheep”
”Alexa begin counting sheep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: counting sheep
des: Counting sheep is a mental exercise used in some cultures as a means of putting oneself to sleep. The practitioner envisions an endless series of identical white sheep jumping over a fence while counting them as they do so. The idea is to occupy the mind with something simple, repetitive, and rhythmic, all of which are known to help humans sleep.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
